results.title: The Effect of Metformin in Treatment of Adenomas in Patients with Familial Adenomatous Polyposis.
results.text_hl: We performed a randomized, double-blind, controlled trial to evaluate the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the regression of @<m>DISEASE_Duodenitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004382 @@@colorectal and duodenal adenoma@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Adenomatous_Polyposis_Coli @DISEASE_MESH:D011125 @@@FAP@@@.

The Effect of Metformin in Treatment of Adenomas in Patients with Familial Adenomatous Polyposis. Cancer Prev Res (Phila). 2021 May;14(5):563-572. PMID: 33509804
